amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds to create or to maintain unofficial recordkeeping systems at VA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to carry out the memorandum from the Veterans Benefit Administration known as Fast Letter 13-10, or to create or maintain any patient record-keeping system other than those currently approved by the Department.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Gosar.
